meanings.definition: The layer of material between the insole and outsole of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: The midsoles of my sneakers provide cushioning for my feet.
meanings.sent2: When buying new shoes, always check the midsoles for comfort and support.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped on my own midsoles while trying to tie my shoelaces!
meanings.sent4: The midsoles of the shoe are like a soft barrier between your foot and the ground.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the midsoles makes the shoes stand out in a crowd.

meanings.definition: The middle layer of a sandwich sole.
meanings.sent1: The delicious sandwich had a generous layer of midsoles made of fresh bread.
meanings.sent2: The midsoles of the sandwich added a perfect balance to the flavors.
meanings.sent3: I always save the midsoles of my sandwich for last because they're my favorite part!
meanings.sent4: The midsoles of the sandwich held together all the tasty ingredients like a tasty glue.
meanings.sent5: The midsoles of the sandwich were so fluffy and light, they almost floated off the plate.
